page.title: 11THE CENTRE, PRINCES RISBOR;
page.content: Risborough Community Centre is small but the activities it shelters and sponsors reach every section of the population. Indoor and outdoor sports are centred on the hall, playing fields and changing rooms; juniors keep fit, teenagers roller skate while parents and grandparents meet to play scrabble and whist, to dance, spin or just chat at Clubnights. You can attend an Antique Fair, a Wedding Recaption or a Church Service; have your feet tended by a chiropodist or help the rehabilitation of a group of former mental patients. If all this can happen in a sports hall plus Clubroom, the planned extensions to include small hall, committee rooms, staging and extra storage will both reduce the pressures on other venues and promote even more volunteer or special interest groups to form and expand the community
